title: Making the news; ABC news
brief_description: A two-part look at the production of ABC television news. In the first part Mary Delahunty takes us on a behind-the-scenes tour of the selection and production processes involved in the presentation of the news. The second part of the video is the actual news program which we have seen being put together in the first part.
